snippet.title: Call of Duty: Ghosts Trailer Has No Footage, Lots Of Masks And More Info May 21st
snippet.description: Video I have no idea if this is the first official confirmation that the next Call of Duty game is indeed subtitled "Ghosts," but we've all been assuming it for a while now ever since some retailer leaks. Of course, now that it's been figured out, it's time to start the marketing [...]

snippet.title: How To Celebrate Halloween In Las Vegas
snippet.description: As October 31 approaches, you’re probably trying to plan the best way to celebrate Halloween. But rather than go to the same old costume party or, worse, stay at home handing out bags of candy corn to the neighborhood trick-or-treaters, make this a Halloween to remember by spending it in [...] read »

snippet.title: The Tricks and Treats in the Business of Halloween Pop-Up Shops
snippet.description: Halloween is just around the corner, but the shops peddling costumes, makeup, fake tombstones and all manner of cobwebs, skulls and life-size plastic ghouls have been doing a brisk business all month. Specialty stores sprout seemingly overnight in temporary locations like empty mall stores, then slam shut like a coffin right [...] read »

snippet.title: 'Batman Arkham Origins iOS' Review - Bat-Mite Begins
snippet.description: While this mobile game's big brother is caught up in a fierce argument between traditionalists and modernizers, Netherealm's tap-em-up suffers from no such complications. Instead it offers a diverting and solidly-constructed cameo in contrast to the open-world charms of the mainstream Arkham series. read »

snippet.title: Steve Jobs Bio: Neither Insane Nor Great
snippet.description: There’s a moment in Tom Wolfe’s ‘The Right Stuff,’ where Wolfe does something crazy. The writer not only describes the reaction of Ham, a chimp launched into space in 1961, to his first exposure to the media. He crawls inside that chimp’s skull and makes the reader understand what he [...] read »
